name: seriously
content:
seriously adverb
(BADLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 badly or severely: Badly cooked shellfish can make you seriously ill. He wasn't seriously injured - he just got a few cuts and bruises.
More examplesFewer examplesI seriously think she'll go crazy if she doesn't have a holiday soon.I would seriously consider moving if I had a child.Are you seriously telling me that you think you're fat?No but seriously, I wouldn't worry about that if I were you.She isn't seriously thinking of telling him, is she?
